comments:
Failure when deleting newly created local task

To reproduce, from Task List view hit Insert button and type description. The above error appears when you hit enter in the "in-place editor"

Rob: I got rid of the NPE by doing a null check on parentEditor, but this means that the label of the editor tab does not update when the description is changed via the Task List.  This should be fixed for 0.6.1.
